name: Special Marble:Adventure Jungle
description:
Enjoy this set of balls and the spectacular high-definition version of the bubble game!
How to play:
1. Touch the screen where you want to shoot
2. Match 3 or more same Marbles color to eliminate them
3. Shoot colored marbles in group of 3 or more to match them
4. More marbles connected, higher score
5. Many weapons and marble bomb are available


Features:
- Easy to play, it is fun for all age players.
- Having 3 special arcade worlds : jungle, desert and ice.
- Having 30 different and challenging levels with increased difficulty.
- Bombs and other interesting weapons are available.
